snippet.title: Scorn - Gameplay & Release Date Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Get a fresh look at the horrifying labyrinth that awaits you in Scorn on 21 October 2022.  

Awoken in a desolate hellscape, explore a once industrial civilization that now lay in ruin. Surrounded by nightmarish bio-mechanical contraptions you’ll search for unsettling answers to find a way forward.  

Your nightmare begins this Halloween...available on Xbox Series S|X (day one with Xbox Gamepass) and PC (via Steam and Epic Games Store) 

Follow us @scorn_game for all the latest news.
